text: Barney’s World is an American Kids Show Aired on Cartoon Network. The show, which was produced by Mattel Television and Nelvana of Corus Entertainment, is a relaunch of the Barney franchise, which gave rise to its first TV show, Barney & Friends, which was based on its predecessor, Barney & the Backyard Gang. In contrast to the two live-action series that came before it, this one is presented in computer-generated imagery. Two to six-year-olds are the target audience for this series. ==Episodes== Category:2024 American television series debuts Category:2020s American animated television series
title: Barney’s World
